articles.title: KAPPC Urges Foreigners in S. Korea to Take Measures for Evacuation
articles.content:
KAPPC Urges Foreigners in S. Korea to Take Measures for Evacuation
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee issued the following statement on Tuesday:
					 The situation on the Korean Peninsula is inching close to a thermonuclear war due to the evermore undisguised hostile actions of the United States and the south Korean puppet warmongers and their moves for a war against the DPRK. 
					
					 The prevailing situation is seriously affecting peace and security not only on the peninsula but in the rest of the Asia-Pacific. 
					
					 The DPRK has already declared strong military counteractions to protect the dignity of the nation and the sovereignty of the country from the increasing threat of the aggressors. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are now watching for a chance to start a war against the DPRK after massively introducing WMDs including nuclear war hardware into south Korea.
					
					 Once a war is ignited on the peninsula, it will be an all-out war, ie a merciless sacred retaliatory war to be waged by the DPRK.
					
					 It does not want to see foreigners in south Korea fall victim to the war.
					
					 The committee informs all foreign institutions and enterprises and foreigners including tourists in Seoul and all other parts of south Korea that they are requested to take measures for shelter and evacuation in advance for their safety.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Media's Rhetoric against DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Media's Rhetoric against DPRK Assailed
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo, Munhwa Ilbo, Segye Ilbo and other die-hard conservative media of south Korea are describing the new strategic line set forth at the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea as a "provocation with an attempt at nuclear weaponization" and "extremely dangerous brinkmanship tactic", saying that "the north's behavior is assuming increasing danger".
					 They even reviled the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system, calling them a "group of criminals", thereby distorting the prevailing situation on the Korean Peninsula and misleading the public opinion.
					
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Journalists Union of Korea in a statement Tuesday dismissed the south Korean media's rhetoric as another hideous provocation against the DPRK and an intolerable act of treachery.
					
					 The confrontation moves by the paid conservative media have now gone beyond the tolerance limit with the backing of the puppet regime, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 As had been branded by the public at home and abroad, the vicious conservative media of south Korea are no more than pseudo-media that have been reduced to a dutiful servant for the colonial ruler, a dirty waiting maid of fascist dictatorship and a hideous trumpeter inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen, quite contrary to their mission as media.
					
					 The north-south relations have been pushed to the lowest ebb in history and the south Koreans' living and safety have been seriously threatened. Such a serious situation is by no means irrelevant with the conservative media's coarse invectives against the DPRK.
					
					 If the group of the paid media is allowed to keep up the acts of treachery and confrontation with fellow countrymen, there will break out only a war.
					
					 The paid hack writers are hideous war criminals who should be sternly punished to death as they agitate confrontation with fellow countrymen, incite a war and foster injustice.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK ready to fight a final battle with the aggressors and provokers will wipe out the hotbeds of top-class war crimes with the retaliatory blows of justice the moment a flare is shot up signaling the start of a battle for annihilating enemies.

articles.title: Japan-Korea Friendship Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japan-Korea Friendship Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange headed by Chairman Kenki Nakamura arrived here by air Tuesday.

articles.title: Factory, Individuals Awarded Order of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Factory, Individuals Awarded Order of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Rakwon Foodstuff Factory and Song Tong Gyu, Choe Kyong Guk, Pak Chung Jin, Han Il Yong, Sin Yong Su and Jo Song Min were awarded Order of Kim Il Sung in high recognition of their great contributions to the building of a thriving socialist nation on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The above-said factory and the people have upheld the undying feats of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and creditably performed the duties assigned to them by the Workers' Party of Korea through a dynamic drive to bring about a decisive turn in the economic construction and the improvement of the standard of people's living, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the WPK.
					
					 The relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was promulgated on April 4.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Prize Awarded to Persons of Merit
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Prize Awarded to Persons of Merit
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung Prize was awarded to Mun Ki Chang, Ri Ui Jong, Ri Sin Ung and Choe Suk Myong on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The conferment was in recognition of their great contributions made to developing the nation's science and technology, training technicians and creating art works of national value, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's plan for building a highly civilized socialist country.
					
					 The relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was promulgated on April 4.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Brazilian Ambassador
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Brazilian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by Brazilian Ambassador to the DPRK Roberto Colin on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The ambassador conveyed them to an official concerned on Tuesday.

articles.title: Sports Tournaments Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Sports Tournaments Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Sports tournaments of different events are taking place or to be held in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to mark the Day of the Sun (April 15), birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It is a unanimous desire of the Korean people and other world progressives to significantly mark the birthday as a holiday common to mankind.
					
					 The International Association of Athletics Federations-26th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon will be held in Pyongyang on April 14, with participation of marathoners of the DPRK and other countries. 
					
					 The second round of the premier soccer league is now under way at Kim Il Sung Stadium and Sosan Football Stadium.
					
					 Contests in scores of events like basketball, volleyball, table tennis, badminton, shooting and cycling are going on at various sites of Pyongyang, including gymnasiums in Chongchun Street, as part of the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games.
					
					 Meanwhile, the 16th Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games of City-level officials is now gaining momentum after its start in March.
					
					 Besides, various sports games have been held at institutions, industrial establishments, co-op farms and universities.
					
					 The ongoing sports tournaments make the country seethe with holiday atmosphere.

articles.title: Senior Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senior Officials Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials and members of the party leadership bodies in Pyongyang visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Tuesday to pay deep respects to leader Kim Jong Il to mark the 20th anniversary of his election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission (NDC). 
					 A floral basket sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK NDC and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was seen before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A floral basket in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the WPK Central Military Commission, the DPRK NDC, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet was laid before the statues.
					
					 The participants paid deep tribute to the statues.
					
					 They entered the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state and made bows to him in humble reverence.
					
					 They went round the hall where the orders he received are on display and the halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him.

articles.title: Concert Given by KPA Song, Dance Ensemble
articles.content:
Concert Given by KPA Song, Dance Ensemble
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A concert "We Will Win Final Victory with Arms of Paektusan" was given by the Korean People's Army Song and Dance Ensemble at the April 25 House of Culture on Tuesday, the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Enjoying the concert were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party, state and army, a chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and Pyongyang citizens.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the chief of the Pyongyang mission of  the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, visiting overseas Koreans, diplomatic envoys of different countries, representatives of international organizations, military attaches here and their spouses.
					
					Put on the stage were mixed chorus "We Will Win Victory, Flying the Colors of the Supreme Commander", dance "Our Arms", mixed duet and mixed chorus "Fly High, Our Party Flag", kayagum ensemble and male pangchang "Our Satellite Is on Its Orbit" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the revolutionary feats Generalissimo Kim Jong Il performed by establishing an advantageous Korean-style state political system for implementing Songun politics in all fields and laying strong foundations for eternal prosperity of the nation.
					
					 Also staged were dance "Final Decisive Battle", tenor solo "Soldier's Wish Runs to South Sea" and mixed chorus and tap dance "Advance and Advance." They truthfully represented the will of the defenders of justice to put a definite end to the long-standing history of confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and bring about a bright day of national reunification.

articles.title: Stage of Poems, Songs Given by Youth and Students
articles.content:
Stage of Poems, Songs Given by Youth and Students
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A stage of poems and songs "Might of Korea" was given by youth and students in Pyongyang at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday to celebrate the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 It began with celebrating poem "Great Joy in April".
					
					 In small chorus "Glory to General" and poem recital "He Is Chairman of the National Defence Commission" the performers presented the greatest tribute to Kim Jong Il, who paved the way for a bright future of Songun Korea and provided a guarantee for the eternal prosperity of the nation.
					
					 Mixed duet and chorus "On the High Pass and Steep Road on This Land" and five-people poem "Song of Victory" vividly represented the immortal leadership feats and noble traits of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who called at soldiers and instilled into them firm belief in the victory while walking on the steep road of the forefront. 
					
					 Male solo "Might of Korea" struck a chord in the hearts of the audience. It showed the fact that Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un represent the strong power of Songun Korea as they glorified the DPRK as the world-level military giant, nuclear weapons state and satellite manufacturing and launching state. 
					
					 The stage came to an end with small choruses "Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives". It showed well the fixed will of the members of young vanguard to become five million arms and ten million bombs, successfully wrap up the all-out action with the U.S. and brilliantly realize the cause of building a thriving nation, in hearty response to the decision of the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Present there were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, officials of the youth league, youth and students in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place on Tuesday, the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Dancing parties at the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower and the Arch of Triumph and in other places of Pyongyang began as songs "People Will Live Long under His Care" and "Our General Is the Best" resounded forth.
					
					 The dancers presented seas of beautiful dances, recollecting the proud path covered by the DPRK, which always won victories with Kim Jong Il at the head of the DPRK.
					
					 Youth and students danced to the tune of immortal classic masterpiece "Greeting the Sun Rising over the Taedong River" and other songs "His Ideal", "Our Satellite Is on Its Orbit".
					
					 Songs "The Country and Youth Will Shine", "Flare Up, Bonfire" and "Push Back Frontiers of the Latest Science and Technology" reverberated through dancing places, adding to the elated atmosphere.
					
					 Dancing parties were also held in all provincial seats, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Weightlifters Prove Successful at Championships
articles.content:
Weightlifters Prove Successful at Championships
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful at the 2013 World Juvenile Weightlifting Championships.
					 The championships, which have been under way in Tashkent since April 8 and will last till April 13, brought together more than 440 players from at least 50 countries and regions of the world 
					
					 At the first-day match DPRK players bagged 4 gold medals and one silver medal.
					
					 Ri Su Yon came first and won three gold medals by lifting a total of 153kg -- 67kg in snatch and 86kg in jerk in the women's 44kg category event.
					
					 Pak Jong Ju placed second in total points and bagged one gold medal and silver medal by coming first in jerk in the men's 50kg category event.

articles.title: Songun Leadership Lays Foundations for Nation's Prosperity
articles.content:
Songun Leadership Lays Foundations for Nation's Prosperity
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In the 1990s, he defined the Songun (military-first) politics as a principal political mode under socialism and began applying it in all aspects of the country.
					
					 He reorganized the state mechanism on the principle of giving priority to defence.
					
					 On the basis of the unique theory that the army represents the party, the state and the people, he made ceaseless military inspection to develop the Korean People's Army into an invincible one fully prepared in ideological and military technical terms.
					
					 He realized the modernization of the local defence industry and turned the militia forces into dependable combat ranks and the whole country into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 Thanks to his devoted and energetic efforts, the DPRK has now risen to fame as a full-fledged nuclear state as well as a satellite manufacturing and launching state.

articles.title: Light Industrial Sector Gives Precedence to Raising Goods Quality
articles.content:
Light Industrial Sector Gives Precedence to Raising Goods Quality
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- In response to the speech made by respected Marshal Kim Jong Un at the recent national meeting of light industrial workers, an unprecedented upswing has been effected in the country's light industrial sector.
					 In particular, light industrial factories in Pyongyang City have striven to improve the quality of goods in keeping with the requirements of consumers.
					
					 In this regard, KCNA met Ko In Sil, a department director of the Pyongyang City People's Committee.
					
					 Ko said:
					
					 Upon receiving Marshal Kim Jong Un's speech, light industrial factories in the city began channeling more efforts into the improvement of quality of products.
					
					 Such move could be seen through the 3rd Commodity Show held some days ago, which exhibited some 23,000 items of goods in more than 800 varieties. All of the exhibits won high appraisal for their high quality.
					
					 Various kinds of bags presented by Tongdaewon District were evaluated to be appropriate for export to other countries.
					
					 The improvement of quality of products depends entirely upon the efforts of officials and employees at light industrial sector, since the solid foundation for production has already been laid.
					
					 The show served as an occasion to put spurs to technical exchange among factories and raise competitiveness.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Building Thriving Nation Will Be Immortal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Building Thriving Nation Will Be Immortal
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Leading papers Tuesday editorially mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					 Kim Jong Il assumed the responsible post of chairman of the NDC on April 9, Juche 82 (1993), a reflection of high intention of President Kim Il Sung and unanimous will and desire of the party, the country and the people.
					
					  Peerlessly brilliant Songun commander Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the NDC guaranteed the country's emergence as the most powerful politico-ideological and military giant in the world and a new era of prosperity unprecedented in the nation's history spanning 5,000 years on this land, says Rodong Sinmun.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Il's talented wisdom and distinguished leadership ability, iron will and superhuman devotion, victories were achieved in the confrontation with imperialists and U.S. and eye-opening miracles were made in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 He comprehensively embodied the original Songun politics, developed the Korean People's Army into the matchless revolutionary army and realized the single-minded unity and the great army-people unity on the highest stage based on the Juche idea, Songun idea and the revolutionary solider spirit.
					
					 It is the distinguished feat in the nation's history that he developed the DPRK into a satellite manufacturing and launching state and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state with his noble responsibility for the destiny of the country and the nation, matchless grit and strong determination. 
					
					 The greatest feat he performed for the eternal prosperity of the great Paektusan nation is that he successfully solved the issue of inheriting the leadership.
					
					  The prosperity of socialist Korea will be forever as the DPRK is led by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the brilliant Songun commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Minju Joson says that Kim Jong Il's feats in the Songun revolutionary leadership will shine long along with the development of the DPRK.

articles.title: US Decision to Sell Bunker Buster to S. Korea Blasted
articles.content:
US Decision to Sell Bunker Buster to S. Korea Blasted
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The U.S. decided to sell laser guided bomb Bunker Buster to the south Korean puppet army in May to be used for striking the underground nuclear facilities in the DPRK, according to foreign reports.
					 The U.S. decision on exceptional sale of ultra-modern military weapons, whose export it has so far restricted, only to the south Korean puppet army and their deployment for an actual war proves that its military action for a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula has entered the phase of practical implementation, says Minju Joson Tuesday in a bylined commentary.
					
					 The U.S. has stepped up the moves to stifle the DPRK militarily with main emphasis put on disabling the DPRK's nuclear deterrence for self-defence and forcing it to disarm, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 Typical example is the rapid increase of the U.S. armed forces in south Korea.
					
					 In 2008 the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces agreed to keep the U.S. troops in south Korea at the level of 28,000. Now the number is up by 9,000 to over 37,000.
					
					 The U.S. is running reckless, bereft of reason, being seized by the ambition for world domination.
					
					 If the U.S. is set to make showdown with the DPRK, the latter will respond to it. It is the unanimous will and stand of the army and people of the DPRK to show the U.S. what a real war is like if it really wants.
					
					 The U.S. should face up to the situation and not run headlong.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' War Rackets under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' War Rackets under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Marine Corps designated the militarily sensitive waters of the West Sea of Korea as an operational theater and is mulling a military provocation, intensifying the drills for coping with an emergency and occupying strongholds and firing drills in the air and at sea with the troops stationed in this area involved, trumpeting about "seizure of five islands in the West Sea" and "advance into Pyongyang".
					  Not content with this, the south Korean Marine Corps is planning to stage four rounds of combined drills such as landing, tactical and live shell firing exercises with the U.S. marines involved in the Foal Eagle.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun on Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such military moves are deliberate and premeditated actions to push the extreme tensions to the phase of explosion.
					
					 Such reckless war drumbeats made by the south Korean puppet Marine Corps which does not know what a deadly strike is like are directly linked with the U.S. scenario to escalate the moves for a war against the DPRK by mobilizing the "three major strategic nuclear strike means."
					
					 What the south Korean Marine Corps is now doing is like gambling over the fate of 40 million south Koreans.
					
					 As far as the five islands are concerned, they are within the range of direct sighting strikes of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK, and the puppet Marine Corps there is nothing different from rats in a trap.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers should bear in mind that their reckless firing drills are bound to spark off the nuclear strikes of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Another thing they must not forget is that once the merciless retaliatory strike of the KPA kicks off, the battle will not be confined to throwing the five islands into flames.

articles.title: Stop to Foal Eagle Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Foal Eagle Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy in south Korea on April 8 held a news conference at the plaza of Kwanghwamun in protest against the warmongers' nuclear war drills against the north.
					 B-52s' drills for dropping bombs over the north have increased the possibility of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula, it held.
					
					 It demanded the present authorities halt at once the Foal Eagle joint military exercises being staged with the U.S.

articles.title: Japanese Media's False Report Rejected
articles.content:
Japanese Media's False Report Rejected
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Representatives of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on April 3 visited the Tokyo head office of the Japanese Asahi Shimbun and rejected a report malignantly insulting the DPRK and slandering Chongryon.
					 They strongly protested against Asahi Shimbun for releasing an article seriously insulting the DPRK, Chongryon and Koreans in Japan on the basis of sheer lies.
					
					 They termed the article a conspiratorial one peppered with invectives against Chongryon as it was written on the basis of baseless misinformation provided by the Japanese security authorities.
					
					 They demanded the newspaper office make an immediate apology for this and make a correction of the false report.
					
					 Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan are now becoming increasingly vocal protesting against the Japanese authorities and conservative media busy with a smear campaign against the DPRK and Chongryon.

articles.title: US, S. Korea Urged to Pay Heed to DPRK's Warnings
articles.content:
US, S. Korea Urged to Pay Heed to DPRK's Warnings
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany issued a joint statement on March 28 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for their moves for a war against the DPRK.
					 A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the Foal Eagle joint military exercises being staged against the DPRK under the pretext of "annual ones", the statement said.
					
					 It is beyond any doubt that if a war breaks out in Korea again, it will lead to a nuclear war, the first of its kind in the history of world wars, it held, adding:
					
					 The U.S. nuclear submarines are being involved in the war drills and its nuclear strategic bombers fly into the sky above south Korea one after another to stage drills for firepower strike under the simulated conditions of a real war. This proves the danger of the nuclear war maneuvers.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the U.S. and south Korean puppet group may use to justify the on-going war maneuvers, it can never conceal their aggressive and bellicose nature.
					
					 The south Korean bellicose military forces are talking about "the U.S. nuclear umbrella" though the country is exposed to the danger of nuclear disasters, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 On behalf of all fellow countrymen desirous of peace against war we sternly condemn the warmongers for frantically staging the north-targeted war maneuvers, unaware of their death.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should stop at once the north-targeted war maneuvers which will bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. is to blame for the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula.
					
					 The urgent way of preventing a nuclear war is to put an immediate stop to the joint military exercises.
					
					 The only way of fundamentally settling the situation is for the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The key to peace lies in the conclusion of a peace treaty between the DPRK and the U.S. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should pay heed to the warnings of the DPRK.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Kuwait
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A Kuwaiti preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated on April 3.
					 Javid Ahmad, chairman of the Kuwait Asian Journalist Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The chairman said April 15, the birthday of Kim Il Sung, is the greatest auspicious holiday common to humankind.
					
					  The Day of the Sun this year will be more significant as the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 7th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK were successfully held under the guidance of HE Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, the chairman added.
					
					 The committee decided to widely introduce through media the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the greatness of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Philippines
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Philippines
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- A Philippine preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated with due ceremony in Manila on March 14.
					 Norma Binas, vice-chairman of the Philippine Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification on the Korean Peninsula, said in a report at the inaugural ceremony the service personnel and the people of the DPRK worked such historic miracle as beating back the aggression by the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "strongest" in the world and their allies and achieving a shining victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The vice-chairman underscored the need to significantly celebrate the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the war.
					
					  MP Rafael Mariano, president of the Philippine Solidarity Committee for Peace and Reunification on the Korean Peninsula, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Philippine Organization Calls for Celebration of Anniversary of Korean Victory in War
articles.content:
Philippine Organization Calls for Celebration of Anniversary of Korean Victory in War
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- An appeal was made public at the inaugural ceremony of the Philippine preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. The ceremony was held in Manila on March 14.
					 The appeal said:
					
					 We send militant salute to the Korean people on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of their victory in the Fatherland Liberation War which falls on July 27, 2013.
					
					 We pay highest tribute to President Kim Il Sung who led the war to victory.
					
					 The Korean war has not yet been ended.
					
					 During the three-year-long war the U.S. imperialists inflicted an untold disaster upon the Korean people. They have frantically pursued the moves to stifle the DPRK up to this date.
					
					 We call upon organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in all countries to form preparatory committees for marking the 60th anniversary of the their victory in the Fatherland Liberation War as a token of solidarity with them in their struggle to reunify the country under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 We call upon the world people who set store by justice and sovereignty to support the Korean people's struggle for terminating the Korean war and urge the U.S. to pull its troops and nuclear weapons out of south Korea and other parts of the Asia-Pacific region and stop joint military drills in south Korea.
					
					 We also call for expressing firm solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification for the country and conducting activities for introducing the situation of the DPRK and protesting against the aggression moves of the U.S. and the south Korean regime on the occasion of July 27.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks, photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Brazil, Malaysia, Romania and Guinea between March 30 and April 3 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 On display in the venues were photos showing the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "In Hearts of Mankind Forever", "The International Friendship Exhibition House" and "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il, the vice-director of the Medium Enterprises and Economic Cooperation Department of the Brasilia Federal District Government, the secretary in charge of socio-political affairs of the Workers' Unique Centre and other personages highly lauded the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They extended full support and solidarity to the Workers' Party of Korea and service personnel and people of the DPRK in their struggle to firmly defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The general directors of Malaysian companies said the life of Kim Il Sung was dedicated to the people, praising him as the world's great man boundlessly revered not only by the Korean people but by the world people.
					
					 The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Conakry, Guinea praised the revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung who made an undying contribution to the cause of socialism and the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Just Struggle of Korean People Supported by Indonesian Party
articles.content:
Just Struggle of Korean People Supported by Indonesian Party
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Pioneer Party of Indonesia supported the tasks set forth at the recent plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the special statement of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 The party in its statement on April 3 recalled that the U.S. provocative scenario to encroach upon the sovereignty and supreme interests of the DPRK has reached a reckless phase of its implementation, adding:
					
					 To cope with the prevailing grim situation the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK released a special statement in which it declared that the north-south relations would be put in the state of war and if the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime perpetrate a military provocation in any area, it will develop into an all-out war, a nuclear war.
					
					 The March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the WPK was held in Pyongyang under the guidance of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force was laid down at the meeting to cope with the prevailing situation.
					
					 The line is an entirely just revolutionary one to build a thriving socialist nation as it calls for channeling bigger efforts into the economic construction while bolstering up the defence capability of the country by reinforcing the nuclear force for self-defence.
					
					 We will positively join in the just struggle of the Korean people to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country in the future, too.

articles.title: Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by Foreign Parties
articles.content:
Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by Foreign Parties
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Pakistan and the U.S. supported the statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					 21 political parties and organizations of Pakistan including the Awami National Party, the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan, the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and the Trade Union Federation noted in a joint statement on March 31:
					
					 We fully support the measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the aggressor forces' moves to turn Asia into a theater of war.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to dismantle all its military bases in the Far East, stop the joint military drills, lift economic sanctions and discontinue military pressure upon the DPRK.
					
					 We will stand by the Korean people.
					
					 We extend solidarity to the struggle of the Korean people to achieve the country's reunification and strongly call upon the world progressives to actively join in their struggle.
					
					 The U.S. Institute for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism stated on March 28:
					
					 The Korean People's Army clarified its will to take military retaliatory actions against the provocateurs including a preemptive strike at the U.S. mainland.
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. to make a switchover in its policy toward the DPRK and opt for peace talks with it.
					
					 We, followers of the Juche idea, are well aware that the DPRK truly wishes for world peace.
					
					 Whoever with reason is the view that the U.S. made a mistake by threatening the DPRK and is to blame for the resultant danger of a war.

articles.title: US, S. Korean Regime's War Moves Slammed by Austrian Organization
articles.content:
US, S. Korean Regime's War Moves Slammed by Austrian Organization
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Left Bloc of the Austrian Trade Union Federation sent protest letters to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet embassies in Vienna on April 2 in protest against the U.S. and south Korean puppet regime's scenario for a war against the DPRK which has reached a phase of its implementation.
					 The danger of a war is increasing on the Korean Peninsula due to the moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppets against the DPRK, the letters said.
					
					 The letters branded their war drills now under way with nuclear strategic bombers involved as a grave provocation against the DPRK and a reckless act of harassing the world peace and security.
					
					 They urged the U.S. to immediately stop the war moves and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK. They also demanded the south Korean regime roll back its policy of confrontation with compatriots and opt for achieving national reunification.

articles.title: Where Does Threat Come from?: Swedish Political Party
articles.content:
Where Does Threat Come from?: Swedish Political Party
 Pyongyang, April 9 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Sweden posted an article titled "Where does the real threat come from?" on its website on Mar. 28.
					 The article said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea are the arch criminals threatening the DPRK with nuclear weapons.
					
					 They kicked off large-scale joint military exercises with nuclear submarines and strategic bomber B-52 involved.
					
					 The U.S. was the only country in the world that used nuclear weapons and is now insisting on its preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					 It, however, claims those nuclear war exercises are being staged for the purpose of deterrence and labels the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons for self-defence a threat to the world.
					
					 The U.S. scenario for invading the DPRK has already been known to the world.
					
					 The U.S. has refused to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK for decades.
					
					 Why? It is because it seeks to start another war at an appropriate time.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea stage joint military exercises for invading the DPRK every year. They are designed to get armed forces ready in case their scenario for aggression is put into practice.
					
					 The grave situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 But the DPRK is not to blame for it.
					
					 The DPRK desires the building of a thriving socialist country, maintaining peaceful relations with its neighboring countries and the rest of the world, free from any sanction and constant threat of war.
					
					 It is the U.S.  that has a war scenario. A nuclear threat comes from the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK tries to make the U.S. which lacks judgment understand that it will have to pay a dear price for its scenario for aggression.
					
					 The DPRK wants to demonstrate its deterrence.
					
					 The war trumpeters only talk about the "nuclear threat" from the DPRK.

articles.title: CCPAP aconseja evacuacion a los extranjeros en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CCPAP aconseja evacuacion a los extranjeros en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) publico el dia 9 una declaracion que sigue:
					 Debido a las cada dia mas brutales hostilidades y acciones en busca de la guerra anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos, la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana llega al borde de guerra termonuclear.
					
					  La situacion actual influencia gravemente en la paz y la seguridad no solo de la Peninsula Coreana sino tambien de la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					  Ya hemos declarado rotundas contramedidas militares para defender la dignidad de la nacion y la soberania del pais frente a la escalada de amenaza de los agresores.
					
					  Ahora, los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos acechan la oportunidad de lanzar la guerra de agresion a la RPDC introduciendo en gran medida en suelo surcoreano los equipos de guerra nuclear y otras armas de exterminio masivo.
					
					  Si estalla la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, esa sera la total y la sagrada e implacable de venganza para la RPDC.
					
					  No deseamos que sufran danos en ese caso los extranjeros que se encuentran en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  El CCPAP informa que todas las instituciones y empresas extranjeras, turistas y otros extranjeros actualmente en el territorio surcoreano, inclusive Seul, deben tomar previamente las medidas de refugio y evacuacion para la seguridad personal.

articles.title: UPC denuncia conducta conflictiva de medios de prensa surcoreanos
articles.content:
UPC denuncia conducta conflictiva de medios de prensa surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- En cuanto a la nueva linea estrategica presentada en el pleno de marzo de 2013 del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, los medios de prensa surcoreanos de caracter conservador como Chosun Ilbo, Dong-A Ilbo, Munhwa Ilbo y Segye Ilbo dicen que "es una provocacion mediante el intento de armamento nuclear" y "tactica de la punta de barranco" y "se hace cada dia mas peligrosa la conducta del Norte".
					E inducen en error la opinion publica tergiversando la situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana y calumniando atrevidamente la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "grupo de delincuentes". 
					
					El portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Periodistas de Corea, en su declaracion fechada 9, lo califica de grave provocacion a la RPDC y acto de traicion nunca tolerable. 
					
					Ahora pasa el punto limite la campana conflictiva de los medios de prensa conservadores y venales del Sur de Corea que se libra bajo el amparo de la banda de titeres surcoreanos, revela el portavoz y continua:
					
					 Como consideran los nacionales y extranjeros,  los medios de prensa conservadores surcoreanos ya se han convertido en lacayos de gobernante colonial, sirvientes del poder dictatorial fascista y trompeteros de la campana de confrontacion fratricida apartandose de la mision de prensa.
					
					 Se encuentran en la peor fase las relaciones intercoreanas y se ven amenazadas seriamente la vida y seguridad de la poblacion surcoreana, lo cual tiene que ver con la demagogia anti-RPDC de los medios conservadores. 
					
					  Mientras existan los plumiferos venales enloquecidos por la traicion a la nacion y la confrontacion fratricida, no se podra evitar la guerra. 
					
					Son criminales de guerra de categoria especial los medios venales que incitan la confrontacion fratricida y fomentan la guerra y la injusticia. 
					
					  Cuando se de la orden de ataque, los militares y civiles de la RPDC, ya en la fase de batalla final con los agresores y provocadores, eliminaran los focos de crimenes de guerra con el fuego de justicia y venganza descargando el rencor acumulado.

articles.title: Seran eternas hazanas de Kim Jong Il, apuntan periodicos centrales
articles.content:
Seran eternas hazanas de       Kim Jong Il, apuntan periodicos centrales
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- Los periodicos centrales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publicaron hoy sendos editoriales dedicados al 20o aniversario de la eleccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El 9 de abril del 82 (1993) de la Era Juche, segun el proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la unanime voluntad y anhelo de todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo, el Dirigente fue elegido como Presidente del CDN de la RPDC.
					
					Gracias a esa eleccion, la RPDC se convirtio en potencia ideo-politica y militar sin rival y se abrio en esta tierra la nueva epoca de prosperidad nunca vista en la historia nacional de 5 milenios, asi comienza el editorial del diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					La genial inteligencia, la extraordinaria capacidad directiva, la voluntad ferrea y la abnegacion superhumana del Dirigente fueron los factores que posibilitaron las victorias sucesivas en la confrontacion antiimperialista y antiyanqui y los milagros del siglo en la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					Practicando la original politica del Songun, el fortalecio el ejercito popular como el poderoso y revolucionario sin rival y logro la unidad monolitica y la cohesion entre el ejercito y el pueblo, basadas en la idea Juche, la del Songun, y el espiritu revolucionario de los militares.
					
					Partiendo de su gran responsabilidad por el destino de la patria y la nacion y dando pruebas de su audacia incomparable y determinacion resuelta, convirtio a la RPDC en fabricadora y lanzadora de satelite artificial y poseedora de armas nucleares, lo cual es hazana registrable en letras doradas en la historia nacional.
					
					Su proeza mas grande realizada por la prosperidad eterna de la potencia del monte Paektu es haber solucionado perfectamente el problema de sucesion de guia.
					
					Gracias a la eleccion del Mariscal           Kim Jong Un, General Insigne del Paektu, a los maximos cargos, se vio garantizada la prosperidad de la Corea socialista.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson subraya que las hazanas del Dirigente hechas al dirigir la revolucion del Songun seran eternas en el transcurso de desarrollo de la RPDC.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica venta de bomba de EE.UU. al Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica venta de bomba de EE.UU. al Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 9 de abril (ACNC) -- Segun fuentes extranjeras, Estados Unidos. decidio vender en mayo al ejercito titere surcoreano la bomba teledirigida por laser Bunker-Buster, disenada para atacar las instalaciones nucleares subterraneas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Hasta la fecha, EE.UU. vino restringiendo la exportacion al extranjero de esa arma sofisticada. Pero, quiere venderla ahora exclusivamente al ejercito surcoreano con el fin de desatar a toda costa la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Asi revela el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 9 y continua:
					
					El imperio intensifica su campana para aplastar militarmente a la RPDC dando su enfoque a neutralizar el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa de ella y desarmarla.
					
					A citar una prueba de ello, se incremento bruscamente en los ultimos anos el numero de los efectivos norteamericanos asentados en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Actualmente, EE.UU. mantiene en suelo surcoreano mas de 37 mil efectivos, o sea, 9 mil mas que 28 mil, numero acordado con la parte surcoreana en 2008.
					
					Parece que la ambicion de dominar el mundo hizo perder juicio a EE.UU.
					
					Si EE.UU. quiere enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC, esta tampoco rehusara el enfrentamiento. Hacer probar a EE.UU. lo que es una guerra de verdad es la unanime voluntad y posicion del ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. debe actuar con prudencia justipreciando la realidad.
